mapper.select: SELECT id as newMsgId,one_word,msg_content_url,msg_name FROM new_msg WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND effective = 1 ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT nm.id AS newMsgId,one_word,msg_content_url,msg_name, msg_type_id,mt.type_name msgTypeName,DATE_FORMAT(publish_date, '%m月%d日') publishDate FROM msg_type mt,new_msg nm WHERE mt.id = nm.msg_type_id AND mt.project_id = #{projectId} AND mt.effective = 1 AND nm.effective = 1 ORDER BY mt.seq DESC, nm.create_date DESC
